name: Undead Souls
description: Undead Souls is an arcade game about killing enemies trying to Beat your Score in a gun filled randomly generated levels.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 120 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 2.9 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 120 MB available space
